name: linkhut
description: LinkHut manages bookmarked links in a minimalistic, shareable interface, helping teams organize URLs and track references in one place

tools.name: LINKHUT_ADD_BOOKMARK
tools.description: Adds a new bookmark to LinkHut. The bookmark can be marked as private/public and read/unread, with optional tags and notes.

inputSchema.title: AddBookmarkRequest

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of the webpage to bookmark

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Comma-separated list of tags for the bookmark

shared.title: Shared
shared.description: Whether the bookmark should be public (true) or private (false)

toread.title: Toread
toread.description: Whether to mark the bookmark as unread

extended.title: Extended
examples: This is a great resource for learning
extended.description: Additional notes or description for the bookmark

description.title: Description
description.description: The title or description of the bookmark

inputSchema.description: Request model for adding a bookmark.

tools.name: LINKHUT_DELETE_BOOKMARK
tools.description: This tool allows users to delete a bookmark from their Linkhut account by providing the bookmark URL. It operates independently and only requires the URL parameter to identify and remove the bookmark.

inputSchema.title: DeleteBookmarkRequest

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of the bookmark to delete

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a bookmark.

tools.name: LINKHUT_GET_ALL_TAGS
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all tags and their usage counts for the authenticated user. No additional parameters required besides authentication.

inputSchema.title: GetAllTagsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for getting all tags. No parameters required.

tools.name: LINKHUT_GET_BOOKMARKS
tools.description: This tool retrieves all bookmarks from the user's Linkhut account. It makes a GET request to the API endpoint and handles authentication. The tool returns a list of bookmarks including details such as URL, title, tags, notes, and timestamp.

inputSchema.title: GetBookmarksRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for getting all bookmarks.

tools.name: LINKHUT_UPDATE_BOOKMARK
tools.description: This tool allows users to update an existing bookmark in LinkHut. The tool updates the metadata of a bookmark including its title, description, and tags.

inputSchema.title: UpdateBookmarkRequest

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of the bookmark to update

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Comma-separated list of tags for the bookmark

shared.title: Shared
shared.description: Whether the bookmark should be public (true) or private (false)

toread.title: Toread
toread.description: Whether to mark the bookmark as unread

extended.title: Extended
extended.description: Additional notes or description for the bookmark

description.title: Description
description.description: The new title or description of the bookmark

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a bookmark.
